sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import "../styles/profile.css" const OwnerProfile = () => { return (
{/*
setFirstName(e.target.value)} value={firstName} required aria-invalid={validFirstName ? "false" : "true"} aria-describedby="uidnote" onFocus={() => setFirstNameFocus(true)} onBlur={() => setFirstNameFocus(false)} />

4 to 24 characters.
Must begin with a letter.
Letters, numbers, underscores, hyphens allowed.

setLastName(e.target.value)} value={lastName} required aria-invalid={validLastName ? "false" : "true"} aria-describedby="uidnote" onFocus={() => setLastNameFocus(true)} onBlur={() => setLastNameFocus(false)} />

4 to 24 characters.
Must begin with a letter.
Letters, numbers, underscores, hyphens allowed.

setEmail(e.target.value)} value={email} required aria-invalid={validEmail ? "false" : "true"} aria-describedby="emailnote" onFocus={() => setEmailFocus(true)} onBlur={() => setEmailFocus(false)} />

Email is in Incorrect format!!!

setPwd(e.target.value)} value={pwd} required aria-invalid={validPwd ? "false" : "true"} aria-describedby="pwdnote" onFocus={() => setPwdFocus(true)} onBlur={() => setPwdFocus(false)} />

8 to 24 characters.
Must include uppercase and lowercase letters, a number and a special character.
Allowed special characters: ! @ # $ %

setRestaurantName(e.target.value)} value={restaurantName} required aria-invalid={validRestaurantName ? "false" : "true"} aria-describedby="resnote" onFocus={() => setRestaurantNameFocus(true)} onBlur={() => setRestaurantNameFocus(false)} />

4 to 24 characters.
Must begin with a letter.
Letters, numbers, underscores, hyphens allowed.

setZipCode(e.target.value)} value={zipCode} required aria-invalid={validZipCode ? "false" : "true"} aria-describedby="zipnote" onFocus={() => setZipCodeFocus(true)} onBlur={() => setZipCodeFocus(false)} />

Must be of 5 digit number.

*/}
Your Profile
First Name Last Name Email Phone Number Restaurant Name Restaurant Image Cuisine Profile Image
) } export default OwnerProfile
